issue.title: [Python][Parquet] Expose BYTE_STREAM_SPLIT to pyarrow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7951](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7951). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Parquet writer now supports the option of selecting the BYTE_STREAMS_SPLIT encoding. It could be nice to have it exposed in pyarrow.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7951?focusedCommentId=17045996) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
+1. At the minimum pyarrow should be able to read Byte-stream-split encoded columns and display their encoding properly (add the required enum field conversion).

Also cc `[~jorisvandenbossche]`

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7951?focusedCommentId=17058012) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
